scripts.text:
WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5, 7)
  GROUP BY share_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and  financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.share_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.share_id = d.share_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  share_id,
  9,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals
WHERE ratio IS NOT NULL
  AND date >= '2020-07-01'::date
  AND date < '2020-08-01'::date;

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5)
  GROUP BY share_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(value)::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (7,8)
  GROUP BY share_id, date
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.share_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.share_id = d.share_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)

  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  share_id,
  10,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals
WHERE ratio IS NOT NULL
  AND date >= '2020-07-01'::date
  AND date < '2020-08-01'::date;

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(value) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5, 7)
  GROUP BY share_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.share_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.share_id = d.share_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  share_id,
  12,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals
WHERE ratio IS NOT NULL
  AND date >= '2020-07-01'::date
  AND date < '2020-08-01'::date;

WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5,7)
  GROUP BY share_id, date
),
deposits AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS income
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id = 6
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.share_id,
    n.date,
    COALESCE(d.income, 0) - n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN deposits d
    ON n.share_id = d.share_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  share_id,
  11,
  date,
  diff
FROM vals
WHERE diff IS NOT NULL
  AND date >= '2020-07-01'::date
  AND date < '2020-08-01'::date;

WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5,7)
  GROUP BY share_id, date
),
balances AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS balance
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE date >= '2020-07-01'::date
    AND date < '2020-08-01'::date
    and financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.share_id,
    n.date,
    COALESCE(d.balance, 0) - n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN balances d
    ON n.share_id = d.share_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  share_id,
  13,
  date,
  diff
FROM vals
WHERE diff IS NOT NULL
  AND date >= '2020-07-01'::date
  AND date < '2020-08-01'::date;
